casebody.data:
Elroy CHESTER, petitioner,
v.
Rick THALER, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 12-10730, 12A1192. Supreme Court of the United States June 12, 2013.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to *2824the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
